list.name: pollutant_var
list.label: Select Pollutant
list.query: SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'data_processed_vgp_cleaned' AND column_name IN ('NO2', 'PM2.5', 'PM10');

targets.rawSql: SELECT time, "[[pollutant_var]]" FROM public.data_processed_vgp_cleaned WHERE "Speed" >= 1 AND (COALESCE(${user_var}, 'All') = 'All' OR participant_virtual_id IN (${user_var:csv})) ORDER BY time;

SELECT g.lat, g.lon, AVG(d."[[pollutant_var]]") AS pollution_level FROM public.clean_gps_cleaned g JOIN public.data_processed_vgp_cleaned d ON g.participant_virtual_id = d.participant_virtual_id AND g.time = d.time WHERE d."Speed" >= 1 AND g.lat BETWEEN 47.5 AND 50.5 AND g.lon BETWEEN 1.5 AND 7.0 GROUP BY g.lat, g.lon ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('hour', time) AS time, AVG("[[pollutant_var]]") AS avg_value FROM public.data_processed_vgp_cleaned WHERE "Speed" >= 1 AND (COALESCE(${user_var}, 'All') = 'All' OR participant_virtual_id IN (${user_var:csv})) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;

SELECT activity, AVG("[[pollutant_var]]") AS avg_pollution, COUNT(*) AS records FROM public.data_processed_vgp_cleaned WHERE "Speed" >= 1 AND (COALESCE(${user_var}, 'All') = 'All' OR participant_virtual_id IN (${user_var:csv})) GROUP BY activity ORDER BY avg_pollution DESC;

SELECT "Speed", "[[pollutant_var]]" FROM public.data_processed_vgp_cleaned WHERE "Speed" >= 1 AND (COALESCE(${user_var}, 'All') = 'All' OR participant_virtual_id IN (${user_var:csv})) ORDER BY "Speed";
SELECT activity, AVG("Speed") AS avg_speed FROM public.data_processed_vgp_cleaned WHERE "Speed" > 0 GROUP BY activity ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;

SELECT ROUND("Humidity"::numeric, -1)::TEXT AS humidity_range, AVG("[[pollutant_var]]") AS avg_pollution FROM public.data_processed_vgp_cleaned WHERE (COALESCE(${user_var}, 'All') = 'All' OR participant_virtual_id IN (${user_var:csv})) AND "[[pollutant_var]]" IS NOT NULL GROUP BY humidity_range ORDER BY humidity_range;

SELECT CORR("Temperature", "[[pollutant_var]]") AS temp_pollutant_corr, CORR("Humidity", "[[pollutant_var]]") AS humidity_pollutant_corr FROM public.data_processed_vgp_cleaned WHERE "[[pollutant_var]]" IS NOT NULL;
